title: Vegetable paella
ingredients: ['3 tbsp olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 courgettes, trimmed and diced', '2 carrots, peeled and diced', '250g paella or risotto rice', '227g can chopped plum tomatoes', '1/2 tsp turmeric', 'pinch of paprika', '800ml vegetable stock, hot', '100g French beans, trimmed and cut into short lengths', '100g frozen peas', '2 tbsp chopped, fresh flat-leaf parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'sprig of flat-leaf parsley to garnish']
